item.dc:creator: @gawdz666 gawdz666
item.description:
@gawdz666 wrote:

[quote=“KO9, post:2, topic:304985”]Provider/Network connection won’t cause a NPE.

I suggest you look at DelayedEventHandler.java line 44[/quote]

I know what delayed event handler is doing but i dont know why…

			if(event.belongsTo(player)) {
				iterator.remove();
			}

But what happens is it throws a nullpointerexception…

i ran the server fine it was up 5 days straight on my computer…

only started throwing exceptions after extreme lag imo due to ddos on the dedi.

whatever imma figure it out… i was sleeping and i was working meatstick thats why he posted it on here so SMD.
